text: People accused Kardashian of breaking the law by putting son Saint West in a forward - facing car seat. Dia Dipasupil / Getty Images The INSIDER Summary : Kim Kardashian has responded to criticism over the position of her son Saint West's car seat. The mom of two posted a photo of her 20 - month - old son in a forward - facing car seat on Facebook this June. In the comments, many people argued the car seat position was unsafe and broke California state law that requires toddlers under 2 to sit in rear - facing seats.
